file.name: read-write-only-spec.yaml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.0"
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Read-Write Only Spec 

paths:
  /readWriteOnly:
    get:
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ReadWriteOnly'

    post:
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ReadWriteOnly'
        
      responses:
        201:
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ReadWriteOnly2'

components:
  schemas:
    ReadWriteOnly:
      type: object
      required:
        - readonly
        - writeonly
      properties:
        readonly:
          type: string
          readOnly: true
        writeonly:
          type: string
          writeOnly: true
        both:
          type: string

    ReadWriteOnly2:
      allOf:
        - type: object
          properties:
            readonly:
              type: string
              readOnly: true
            writeonly:
              type: string
              writeOnly: true
            both:
              type: string
        - required:
          - writeonly

Error: buildIR: make ir: path "/readWriteOnly": post: responses: 201: contents: application/json: generate schema: allOf: schema type mismatch: object and
